issues.message: The scene depicts the locking of the 'Crit or Quit' build (milestone: crit_build_locked), but this milestone is already marked as DONE in the pre-scene invariants (must_stay_true). This suggests the scene is repeating events already established in the continuity state.
Authoritative appearance check is missing for present cast members (CHAR_ARTIE, CHAR_FIZZ).
The pre-state chapter_so_far contains duplicate entries for Artie's build commitment.
UI shows Available Points but no matching stat exists in state.
UI shows Bonus Anomaly Pool but no matching stat exists in state.
UI shows Critical Hit Rate but no matching stat exists in state.
